page.title: 0104600153 - Resume
page.content: This is a rural area with much farmland used for crops, grassland pasture and rough grazing. The area contains within it, one self contained community known as{Sherborne St. John, and the northern part of the town of {Basingstoke.}Sherborne St. John has both private and council owned property and is essentially a commuter village. The population of the area is made up of locally born "Hampshire Hogs", London overspill families and a cross section of people from other areas of the country and abroad. The area contains many interesting and picturesque walks, a golf course and several recreational facilities. The District General, Maternity and Psychiatric Hospitals are the major employers in the area.
